item.title: Contour Example 7: Using the CSOListContainer
item.description: Contour Example 7: Using the CSOListContainer Introduction In this example, we are using the module CSOListContainer instead of the CSOManager. The CSOManager is a heavy weight, UI driven module. You can use it to see all of your CSOs, CSOLists and CSOGroups in the module panel. The CSOListContainer is a light weight module with focus on Python scripting. We recommend to use this module for final application development, because Python provides much more flexibility in handling CSO objects.
